text: Margaret Isabel Dunning (June 26, 1910 â€“ May 17, 2015) was an American philanthropist. She was the benefactor of the Plymouth (Michigan) Historical Museum. She was born in Redford, Michigan. Dunning died at the age of 104 from complications from a fall while on a trip in Santa Barbara, California. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Accidental deaths in California Category:American centenarians Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Michigan
title: Margaret Dunning
